snippet: The journalist, Gianluigi Nuzzi, who wrote a book detailing financial mismanagement in the Vatican, was called to be interrogated in a case against a monsignor accused of leaking documents.
abstract: Italian journalist Gianluigi Nuzzi, author of book examining financial misconduct in Vatican, refuses to be questioned by Vatican magistrates in case against monsignor accused of leaking documents.
lead_paragraph: The journalist, Gianluigi Nuzzi, who wrote a book detailing financial mismanagement in the Vatican, was called to be interrogated in a case against a monsignor accused of leaking documents.

headline.main: Italy: Reporter Rebuffs Summons by Vatican for Questioning on Leaks
headline.print_headline: Europe; Italy: Reporter Rebuffs Summons by Vatican for Questioning on Leaks
